snippet: Thailand should be liable to potential U.S. sanctions for failing to crack down on trafficking in migrant workers, a group of human rights and labor organizations said on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Groups Say Thailand Should Face U.S. Sanctions Over Trafficking
headline.main: Groups Say Thailand Should Face U.S. Sanctions Over Trafficking

lead_paragraph: Thailand should be liable to potential U.S. sanctions for failing to crack down on trafficking in migrant workers, a group of human rights and labor organizations said on Friday.
